title: How to clean a NESCAFÉ® Dolce Gusto® Machine
description:
Day-to-day cleaning of your machine is easy: you can put the pod holder in the dishwasher and the backpanel just needs a wipe down with a damp cloth. NESCAFÉ® Dolce Gusto® provides you with the possibility to clean the head of your machine in a safe and easy way, thanks to our cleaning kit.
The cleaning kit set includes 40 wet wipes and 20 brushes.
 
Visit our care page to learn more about caring for your machine: www.dolce-gusto.co.uk/machine-care

asset.author: NESCAFÉ Dolce Gusto Worldwide Channel
